text: Dave Johnson is an American football coach and former player. He served as the head football coach at Simon Fraser University in British Columbia from 2007 to 2013. Johnson was drafted by the BC Lions of the Canadian Football League in the 6th round of the 1988 CFL Draft. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football linebackers Category:Simon Fraser Clan football players Category:Simon Fraser Clan football coaches
title: Dave Johnson (American football coach)
